title: A New Beginning in Ice Nation
content:
In April 2021, Benjam√≠n moved into the Ice Nation. It was a brand new complex, and it shimmered like a pristine snowfield under the early spring sun. As he stepped into his townhouse, a sense of excitement filled him. He had been waiting for this moment for a long time.

With 15 other families now residing in the complex, each of the 16 units had a story of its own. Ben couldn't wait to get to know his new neighbors and make this place his home. The prospect of new beginnings and friendships made his heart dance with joy. Little did he know that his journey in the Ice Nation was about to be filled with surprises and adventures.
